short_description: Modern fighting action meets World Tour mode's RPG elements.  Deep combat system, customizable characters, and vibrant visuals.
PvPvE bounty hunting in the Louisiana bayou.  Face monstrous creatures and rival hunters for gruesome rewards.
Post-apocalyptic action RPG with fluid combat, stylish characters, and a gripping story unfolding in a vast, ruined world.
Explore a vast open world, build bases, engage in realistic combat, and experience dynamic warfare using advanced weaponry and vehicles.
Brutal, squad-based tactical combat.  Manage resources, upgrade your mercenaries, and conquer rival companies.
Brutal PvPvE shooter.  Scavenge, loot, fight for survival against other players and AI.  Extract with your bounty.
Stylish action combat in a sprawling metropolis, battling Hollows and uncovering a mysterious city's secrets.
Survive, tame, and build in a prehistoric world.  Craft, explore, and conquer the harsh environment and its creatures.
Lead your civilization through the ages, mastering diplomacy, technology, and warfare to achieve global dominance.
A refined MOBA experience.  New gods, updated maps, and enhanced gameplay mechanics deliver thrilling 5v5 battles.
MMORPG with dynamic combat, seamless open world, and class-shifting abilities.  Explore, conquer, and craft your destiny.
Explore a mysterious, fog-shrouded world, solve environmental puzzles, and uncover a dark secret.  Survival depends on resourcefulness and wit.
Solve puzzles, escape a creepy toy factory, and avoid terrifying creatures.  First-person horror puzzle adventure.
Cooperative adventure game where a divorcing couple must repair their relationship, solving puzzles and challenges together.
Hack-and-slash action featuring iconic Chinese warriors, battling hordes of enemies in epic historical battles.
Revamped gameplay features enhanced skating, realistic physics, and improved AI for a more authentic hockey experience.
Fast-paced, action-packed battles against waves of enemies.  Upgrade your skills and weaponry to survive increasingly difficult challenges.
A charming, physics-based puzzle game where you manipulate a creature's body to solve environmental challenges.
A whimsical RPG blending deckbuilding, exploration, and charming creature collection.  Solve puzzles, battle foes, and uncover a vibrant world's secrets.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: Explore ancient ruins, solve challenging puzzles, and race against time to uncover a hidden civilization's secrets.
Realistic WWII combat; large-scale battles, strategic teamwork, and authentic weaponry define the visceral experience.
3D platforming adventure featuring iconic characters, groundbreaking controls, and creative level design. Collect stars to progress.
Vast, atmospheric open world.  Explore a dangerous, mutated Zone, scavenge for resources, and fight for survival against anomalies and hostile factions.
Brutal survival in a post-apocalyptic Chernobyl. Scavenge, fight, and craft to survive the Zone's deadly anomalies and mutated creatures.
Cooperative grocery shopping spree!  Race against the clock, grabbing items from lists to fulfill customer orders.
MMORPG featuring action combat, diverse classes, and a vast world to explore, offering both PvE and PvP experiences.
Grueling psychological horror.  Experiment on inmates, escape Murkoff's clutches, and survive deadly trials alone or with friends.
Become an android, explore a branching narrative, and make impactful choices shaping your destiny and the future of androids and humans.
Unleash devastating strikes and ground game dominance.  Experience realistic fighter movement and brutal knockout power.
A charming life sim MMO where you build relationships, craft, fish, and explore a vibrant world.
Survive the Amazon rainforest's harsh environment.  Fight for survival against the elements, wild animals, and starvation.
Experience unparalleled realism in a vast, detailed world.  Fly diverse aircraft, conquer challenging weather, and explore stunning global scenery.
Auto battler where you strategically position champions, battling for survival against seven other players.  Last one standing wins.
Explore procedurally generated galaxies, discover alien life, trade resources, and build your own spaceship and base.
Manage your farm, cultivate crops, raise livestock, and sell your produce to expand your operations and build a thriving agricultural empire.
Open-world RPG shooter set in a post-pandemic Washington D.C.  Customize your agent, explore the city, and battle enemy factions.
Massive crossover fighting game featuring iconic characters.  Fast-paced combat, items, stages, and diverse gameplay styles.
Parkour-fueled zombie survival.  Brutal combat.  Day-night cycle affects gameplay.  Craft weapons, explore a vast city.
Third-person stealth action in WWII-era Europe.  Use your skills to eliminate Nazi targets with precision sniping and close-quarters combat.
MMORPG set in a vibrant fantasy world.  Explore, craft, fight, and conquer Aeternum in a persistent online experience.
Explore a charming island, build friendships, and craft adorable items to customize your own paradise.
Rhythm-based musical battles featuring iconic artists.  Unlock new songs and characters, mastering complex patterns to achieve victory.
Massive online tank battles.  Command iconic vehicles, upgrade your arsenal, and dominate the battlefield. Team play and strategic combat are key to victory.
A challenging roguelike where you play as Isaac, battling hordes of monsters and bosses using bizarre items and power-ups.
Fast-paced, mech-based combat against relentless alien hordes.  Customize your mech, upgrade weapons, and survive.
Open-world crime adventure featuring gang wars, car theft, and RPG elements in a vast, 90s-inspired California setting.
Dress up your stylish avatar, complete challenging styling levels, and collect gorgeous outfits in a vibrant fantasy world.
Loot-driven first-person shooter with co-op gameplay, featuring distinct character abilities and a vast, chaotic world.
PvP-focused MMORPG with classic medieval fantasy setting, featuring large-scale battles and character progression.
Manage a supermarket, from stocking shelves to satisfying customers.  Expand your business and become a retail tycoon!
